title: Zacs E no longer shows max range
body: So i was playing {{champion:154}}  yesterday for the first time this patch, and i noticed his E indicator had been changed in a way that it no longer shows max range. Is there any context on this change because i feel like it makes him a bit harder to play as i don't play him enough to know his E ranges per level.

replies.body: That's an unintentional change, believe we've got a fix in for the next patch.

> [{quoted}](name=Meddler,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=RqIJn0N9,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-01-20T07:08:51.684+0000)
>
> That's an unintentional change, believe we've got a fix in for the next patch.

Why was it touched anyway?

As I understand it wasn't a change to Zac specifically, but to how some spells with variable range per rank display that range. Someone cleaning up code who didn't realize a really niche effect their changes would have at a guess?

This is a bit off topic but, what are your thoughts on Nami's power level? 

Personally I never see her played anymore which us saddening.

Ive been seeing her played far more recently in challenger streams after the soraka nerfs. I believe that she's rather good right now but maybe not top tier. 

P.S. Ive been finding her to be very strong myself
A rioter broken it during the 6.1 patch it will be fixed next patch
